title: Data Science Hero's Journey
description: An interactive circular visualization of the data science workflow presented as Joseph Campbell's hero's journey with seven stages from problem definition to communication.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Data Science
Workflow
Education
Hero's Journey

learningObjectives: Understand the seven stages of the data science workflow
Recognize that data science is an iterative process
Connect each stage to real-world examples
Appreciate the narrative structure of data science projects

controls.name: Auto-animate stages
controls.description: Toggle automatic cycling through stages with glowing effect

controls.name: Stage hover
controls.description: Hover over any stage node to see detailed description

controls.name: Stage click
controls.description: Click any stage to view real-world examples panel

relationships: Return arrows showing iteration (Evaluation to Data Collection, Modeling to Data Cleaning, Communication to Problem Definition)

learningObjectives: Understand the key concepts of data science hero's journey
Explore data science hero's journey through interactive visualization
Apply knowledge of data science hero's journey to solve problems
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on data science hero's journey
